subtitleNullable: Short Text based Depression Classification Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This dataset has two columns:
1. text: this column has short form text generated using LLM which have different tones and assertions with respect to authors being depressed or not.

2. label: two values representing the classes Depressed- Signified by 1, and Not Depressed - signified by 0.

**NOTE: This is not a CLINICAL DATASET**
title: Short-Text Dataset for Depression Classification
